content: आतप {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Causing pain or affliction. --पः {@--1@} Heat (of the sun, fire &c.), sunshine; आतपायोज्झितं धान्यं <ls>Mb.</ls> exposed to the sun; तमातपक्लांतं <ls>R. 2. 13</ls>; शीतातपाभिघातान् <ls>Ms. 12. 77</ls>; प्रचंड° <ls>Rs. 1. 11</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 1.">10</ls>; सूर्य° <ls>Me. 108</ls>; बालातपः <ls>Ms. 4. 69</ls> the morning sun; °आक्रांत exposed to heat. {@--2@} Light; छायातपौ ब्रह्मविदो वदंति <ls>Kaṭh.</ls>
